docs.lead_paragraph: WHILE John Hertz, who recently swung a $25,000,000 merger of the New York and Chicago bus lines, was a copy boy for The Chicago Daily News, a doctor told him he must get another job which would take him out into the air. So he began driving a delivery wagon.

headline.main: ONCE IMMIGRANT BOY, BUYS 5TH AV. BUSES; John Hertz Invades New York After Operating Chicago's Bus Service -- Began as Newspaper Copy Boy, Then Drove Wagon

docs.abstract: sp art by S Bent on career of J Hertz
